item.name: ShortSword
item.itemdescription: A short sword is about 2 feet in length.

item.name: HideArmor
item.itemdescription: Made out of cheap hide, this armor provides simple protection from weaker attacks

item.name: PotionCureLightWounds
item.itemdescription: You channel positive energy that cures 1d8 points of damage +1

item.name: ScaleMail
item.itemdescription: Scale mail is made up of dozens of small overlapping metal plates. The suit includes gauntlets.

item.name: PotionCureLightWounds
item.itemdescription: You channel positive energy that cures 1d8 points of damage +1

item.name: Estoc
item.itemdescription: An estoc is a sword about as long as a bastard sword, but designed exclusively for thrusting attacks. Its “blade” is a steel spike with a triangular, square, or hexagonal cross-section.

item.name: LightSteelShield
item.itemdescription: Wooden and steel shields offer the same basic protection, though they respond differently to some spells and effects.

item.name: MwkChainShirt
item.itemdescription: Covering the torso, this shirt is made up of thousands of interlocking metal rings.

item.name: WandCureLightWounds
item.itemdescription: You channel positive energy that cures 1d8 points of damage +1. The wand has 30 uses.

item.name: RepeatingCrossbowBolts
item.itemdescription: Bolts come in a case or quiver that holds 10 bolts (or 5 for a repeating crossbow).

item.name: MwkRepeatingCrossbow
item.itemdescription: The repeating crossbow (whether heavy or light) holds 5 crossbow bolts. You can fire a repeating crossbow with one hand or fire a repeating crossbow in each hand in the same manner as you would a normal crossbow of the same size.

item.name: HalfPlate
item.itemdescription: Combining elements of full plate and chainmail, half-plate includes gauntlets and a helm.

item.name: WandSoundBurst
item.itemdescription: You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony. Every creature in the area takes 1d8 points of sonic damage and must succeed on a Fortitude save to avoid being stunned for 1 round. Creatures that cannot hear are not stunned but are still damaged.

item.name: PotionCureModerateWounds
item.itemdescription: The damage cured increases to 4d8 points of damage + 2 and cures up to 2 points of ability damage.

item.name: ScrollResurrection
item.itemdescription: This scroll functions like the spell raise dead, except that you are able to restore life and complete strength to any deceased creature.

item.name: MwkMithralChainmail
item.itemdescription: Unlike a chain shirt, chainmail covers the legs and arms of the wearer. The suit includes gauntlets.

item.name: FullPlate
item.itemdescription: This metal suit includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and a thick layer of padding that is worn underneath the armor. Each suit of full plate must be individually fitted to its owner by a master armorsmith.

item.name: ScimitarSpellthief
item.itemdescription: This curved blade of golden metal, a +1 keen heartseeking spellstealing scimitar, is the bane of spellcasters. Inscribed with flowing magical script that purports to reveal the inner secrets of magic, the scimitar of the spellthief grants the wielder a +2 bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks.

item.name: PotionBlur
item.itemdescription: The subject’s outline appears blurred, shifting, and wavering. This distortion grants the subject concealment (20% miss chance).

item.name: PotionCureModerateWounds
item.itemdescription: The damage cured increases to 4d8 points of damage + 2 and cures up to 2 points of ability damage.
